description: Many hilly sections with mostly fast and flowey trails. Can be ridden after rain due to the sandy base. A few stunts to challange the skills. No signs or trail markers. Overall a very fun trail to ride.
directions:
From Mansfield ski resort, drive approx. 3 km to gravel road (right turn only), follow this for 200 meters to parking lot and trail head. Equestrian share parking lot and a few trail crossings. Gravel road has Dufferin County experimental forest sign at entrance.
To get there from elsewhere, drive North of Orangeville on Hiway #10 to Hiway 89, go West to CR 124 (just East of Shelburne), go North to CR 17, turn right (East) 14km to Airport Road, turn left (North) 5.4km to parking on right side of road.
title: Dufferin Forest
